extendedInfo.description: Good Morning is more than a talking alarm clock; it's a personal wake-up assistant. It can play a song and read the time, date, weather forecast, calendar entries, today's news, and a custom message of your choice.  And for hard-to-wake types, it can force you to solve a math problem to turn of the alarm.New voices are available for purchase in-app through SVOX.Multiple alarms and calendar reading available with pro key!  Access multiple alarms by hitting "menu" on the main screen.Something broken? Email me, I'll help!

reviews.title: Best alarm around period
reviews.comment: Best alarm around. I have been using it for years.  Having it read my email calender makes it the best around.   Pay for it if you use work email on your phone or use your calender a lot.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Was great
reviews.comment: Fixed the calendar reading issue, will be back to 5 star when weather works every time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ICS
reviews.comment: Screen comes on at the alarm time and within a split second is off. No sound. Used to love this asp - note can\'t rely on it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I used to love this app
reviews.comment: Now the voice doesn\'t work since I upgraded to Galaxy S III.  Fix it and you are back at five stars and ranked as my favorite paid app
reviews.author: Kym Roundtree

reviews.title: What is up with this app?
reviews.comment: It used to work like a charm, but over the last month or so has started giving incorrect info (saying PM instead of am, mis-speaking the time). It never played a song to wake me up though, even though that choice was selected. It\'s been an adventure every morning to see what it will say. This morning however, it woke me by telling the time, didn\'t tell the weather, and I dismissed it. A full minute later, it started playing the alarm song with no way to dismiss it. I had to kill the process somehow.
reviews.author: Jen Hopper

reviews.title: Crashes reading calendar.
reviews.comment: I used to love this app. Now, it crashes when read calendars is checked, and can\'t get weather. These are simple fixes requiring changing apis. Dev is obviously no longer supporting. App still has limited function. Reads time and date.  Update: after app update, it works wonderfully again on my GS3...5 star!
reviews.author: Walter Davis

reviews.title: EVO 4g LTE
reviews.comment: After the update, worked once then hasn\'t worked again. Uninstalled and re-installed it. Works fine now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Xolo q800
reviews.comment: Its a good app. All features works fine. I simply don\'t understand how do i make it read rss feeds. I enter the url but it just don\'t read it. Even the network connection is fine. Please fix the issue in next update.
reviews.author: Khuzema Unjhawala

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Was told about this from a business mentor, i love it! Its the best alarm I\'ve ever had :)
reviews.author: dianna wallace

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: Decided to give this another try after two years without it it failed me twice good thing I had a backup alarm set well I would have been late uninstalling LG escape .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: RAZR maxx hd with jb
reviews.comment: Nope..doesn\'t work. Even after reinstall. Voice isn\'t working at all. Where is the fix?
reviews.author: Gregory Mark

reviews.title: Great app after update 5 months later
reviews.comment: Great app but the slow roll out of updates cripples it, otherwise I\'d be giving it 5 stars. Took 5 months for ICS/JB support...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work any more
reviews.comment: I used to love this app, now the alarm only goes off some of the time, making it unusable.
reviews.author: John Yarbrough

reviews.title: Screen lock
reviews.comment: To use this alarm you need to disable the screen lock no swipe or anything, it will then work but it makes it pretty pointless. Not impressed
reviews.author: Mark Mayer

reviews.title: Good idea
reviews.comment: Liked the idea of the alarm just didn\'t work. Couldn\'t even get it to test right. Too bad.
reviews.author: Nic Ball

reviews.title: jp275
reviews.comment: works great , wife likes my mess to her when the alarm wakesus up!
reviews.author: james reilly

reviews.title: First tim using app and it didn\'t work
reviews.comment: Downloaded and tested last night and it worked fine. This morning it never went off. Luckily I set a backup alarm  Galaxy gs3 JB
reviews.author: Christopher schuman

reviews.title: Little effort to reach 5 stars
reviews.comment: Android version 4.1.2 - I want to be sure about the location when using the GPS for saying the weather.  I would like to read the latitude and the longitude or at least the name of the city to give you 4 stars. You will reach the 5 stars if you let me selecting the location manually and you added the Automatic Snooze. Please go ahead and complete your nice work.
reviews.author: Khaled Abdel-Aziz

reviews.title: Only alarm for me
reviews.comment: Awesome. Had stopped working for a while. The dev has returned with improvements for ics and jelly bean. The most perfect alarm clock is now back online.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent App but with one flaw...
reviews.comment: The app no longer boot automatically after I restart my phone. Am using Google Nexus 4, plz fix..
reviews.author: Evan Qian
